devdoc.author: CitiProof Team
devdoc.details: Manages verified citizen identities and their verification levels

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

StringsInsufficientHexLength(uint256,uin.details: The `value` string doesn't fit in the specified `length`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerCitizen(string,string,uint256,ui.details: Register a new citizen with flexible requirements

params._efpFollowers: Number of EFP followers (0 allowed for new users)
params._efpFollowing: Number of EFP following (0 allowed for new users)
params._efpTokenId: EFP list token ID (can be empty string)
params._ensName: ENS name (can be empty string for wallet-only registration)
params._ipfsMetadata: IPFS hash for additional profile data

registerCitizenSimple().details: Simplified registration for wallet-only users (hackathon-friendly) Automatically generates ENS subdomain and placeholder EFP data

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateReputationScore(uint256,uint256).details: Update reputation score (only called by reputation contract)

devdoc.title: CitizenIdentityRegistry
